data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Michael, Isle of Man to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 641 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Michael, Isle of Man
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 59 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Michael.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 245, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Michael, Isle of Man so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Jurby
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Jurby, Michael, Isle of Man.
Lord, let it be said of the 641 lost in Michael that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 59 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Michael with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
